aggregate.note: 1 of 3 evals timed out; pass rate based on 2 completed evals

key_differences: Both achieve 100% pass rate on completed evals — skill doesn't improve correctness for offline mods as much
With-skill is slightly faster on average (218s vs 285s completed)
Without-skill runeword has Name/Key mismatch risk (space in Name field) — technically passes assertions but may break in-game
Without-skill cubemain.txt was more thorough (15 rows with per-gem-type variants vs 3 compact rows)
quality_notes: With-skill: Name field in runes.txt correctly matches Key in JSON (DragonBreath)
Without-skill: Name field has space ('Dragon Breath') — potential in-game display bug
With-skill: Consistent .mpq folder wrapper and modinfo placement
Without-skill: cubemain.txt more thorough with per-gem variants (15 vs 3 rows)
